message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and features, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Bob, I understand your desire to save, but my offer reflects the true value of this product.  How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
